title: #6 â€” The Chapel Hill Murders and 'Militant' Atheism
description:
Sam Harris responds to the charge that "militant" atheism is responsible for the murder of three Muslim students in North Carolina.

SUBSCRIBE to listen to the rest of this episode and gain access to all full-length episodes of the podcast at samharris.org/subscribe.
